s_title: Wild West C.O.W. Boys of Moo Mesa
s_synopsis: Based on the largely forgotten, but sometimes considered cult cartoon series. Grab your lasso and saddle up as you control one of the cowboys. They are literally cowboys of the bovine variety. Take control of Cowlorado Kid, Dakota Dude, Marshall Moo Montana, and a new character made for the game named Buffalo Bull. Try to save the beautiful, but tough Lily Bovine from the evil corrupt Sheriff Terrorbull. This is a "run and gun" game where you taken on Terrorbull's evil henchmen and even ghosts.
